ing: 3 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
n: Country Cooking Slow Cooker Neck Bones
des: "This is a country, budget-friendly recipe that everyone will enjoy. Serve over rice with a side of green beans."
ins:
Place the neck bones into a slow cooker. Sprinkle in the onion, garlic, salt, and thyme leaves. Pour in the vinegar and water.
Cover and cook on High until the meat is tender, about 4 hours.
